subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Brian Gay made five straight birdies in shooting a five-under-par 66 to take a one-stroke lead over Todd Hamilton after two rounds at the Verizon Heritage in Hilton Head Island, S.C.
snippet: Brian Gay made five straight birdies in shooting a five-under-par 66 to take a one-stroke lead over Todd Hamilton after two rounds at the Verizon Heritage in Hilton Head Island, S.C.
